title: The Reborn
description: Earlier edition of ASIN B012U0PESKThis haunting series follows the investigations of Jon Canopus and Carina Keel, two FBI agents that specialise in the supernatural and paranormal. In 'The Rebornâ€™, a twisted, rotten body of an old woman lies in the snow, a barn covered in strange symbols, full of hanging corpses sits upon a hill and something ancient is watching from the woods. As a winter storm closes in, Canopus and Keel are called in to investigate.
author: Stephen Jarrett
